CustomField.description: This date is used to send Chatter Posts. Added per Case 25358948
CustomField.formula: Date_Survey_Sent__c + case( MOD( Date_Survey_Sent__c - DATE(1900, 1, 1), 7),5,1,0 ) + 5 + 2 * ( FLOOR( (5 + case(MOD(Date_Survey_Sent__c - DATE(1900, 1, 1), 7), 0,0, 1,1, 2,2, 3,3, 4,4, 5,-1, 6,-1, 0 ) )/5 ) )
CustomField.label: Date Survey Sent plus 5 Business Days
